about_the_game:
After a string of missing person reports at an old abandoned park on the uninhabited Maple Island, a journalist decides to venture out to uncover the source of these disappearances. Immediately, something seems off. Unfamiliar noises echo through the forests, and you feel like something is watching you. Retrieving the wooden idols found within the park seems to stir the evil, and might be the key to uncovering this island's mystery.

Using nothing but a map of the park, a compass, and your trusty camera, you must uncover the truth behind these reports before someone, or something stops you.

This game utilizes cutting-edge technology to deliver stunning visuals, a minimal UI to maximize immersion, and many more effects to build a realistic, horrifying world for its players. Many Eyed is a single-player psychological horror game, centered around exploring the map and avoiding any terrifying enemies that may be encountered. Search every location to find wooden idols, in the hopes that you can unravel the island's mystery and escape with not only your camera footage, but also your life.

NOTE: This game utilizes cutting-edge technology from Unreal Engine as well as very high-quality graphical assets to achieve a life-like look and feel. Please consult the listed system requirements below

name: Many Eyed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: In this game you will encounter a variety of visual effects that may provide seizures or loss of consciousness in a minority of people. If you or someone you know experiences any of the above symptoms while playing, stop and seek medical attention immediately.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: These dark and desolate woods appear abandoned. Can you still hear the whispers of its missing hikers? Unravel their mysteries.
